description: The sppsvc component, located at C:\Windows\System32\spp\tokens\rules, has been found to fail in supporting ESU updates for certain installations if the ESU key does not permit installation. This issue can impact systems requiring the ESU MAK add-on, generating complications for users attempting to ensure their environment is up-to-date. It is recommended that administrators apply the updates listed in KB-5031419 or KB-5031407 to mitigate this problem.
